page.title: 02Homes in Aston Cantlow
page.content: I studied the houses in Aston Cantlow.The most common form of housing was the semi detatched house. I found 25 of those. There were 19 cottages mostly terraced,18 detatched houses,6 bungalows plus one being built.There were 5 farms,1 pub,8 flats,5 chalets,6 link detatched bungalows and 1 bakery which adds up to 95 altogether. The pub is run by Whitbreads.There are also quite a few clubs as well.The shop is a modern brick building.The 6 link detatchd bungalows are for old people.There is one house that is being renovated.A bungalow is also being built up Chapel Road. Some of the buildings are thatched and many are old.
